exercises.question: What is a collection of many stocks or bonds that acts as a single unit?
I have used this investment app ______ 2021.
She has held those Apple shares ______ three years.
A ______ uses algorithms to manage your investments automatically.
How ______ have you been tracking this asset's performance?
______ is a measure of how quickly an asset's price changes.
We have diversified our portfolio ______ the market crash.
The strategy of spreading risk across different assets is called ______.
He hasn't checked his brokerage account ______ last Friday.
What is the total collection of all your investments called?
They have been digital asset traders ______ a few months.
A higher ______ usually comes with a higher level of risk.
I haven't received any stock dividends ______ August.
______ represent units of ownership in a corporation.
Has she worked in wealth management ______ a long time?
The robo-advisor has managed my funds ______ I opened the account.
I have known my financial consultant ______ we were in college.
Is the ______ on this government bond guaranteed?
How long ______ you had your crypto wallet?
High ______ means the price of a stock goes up and down very fast.
I have had this ETF portfolio ______ (since/for) six months.
A ______ uses artificial intelligence to invest your money.
She has been interested in green energy stocks ______ (since/for) last year.
Low risk usually results in a lower ______.
They ______ ______ (have/has) (hold) these bonds for five years.
A ______ is a payment made by a company to its shareholders.
How ______ have you been using that trading platform?
He has ______ (be) a premium user of the app since Monday.
An ______ is a fund that tracks a specific index like the S&P 500.
I haven't invested in individual ______ (stocks/shares) for a while.
We have had this savings plan ______ (since/for) several years.
______ means your investment value changes very quickly.
He ______ ______ (not / check) his crypto balance since yesterday.
Reducing risk by buying different assets is ______.
I have ______ (have) this brokerage account since I was twenty-one.
______ (For/Since) how long has she owned those tech shares?
The ______ on this investment is 4% annually.
She has ______ (be) a successful trader for a decade.
Many tech companies do not pay a monthly ______.
We haven't changed our strategy ______ (since/for) the start of the year.
have / I / had / ETF / since / 2020 / this
exercises.answer: I have had this ETF since 2020

exercises.question: been / she / has / trader / a / for / months / six
exercises.answer: she has been a trader for six months

exercises.question: long / how / you / have / invested / ? / been
exercises.answer: how long have you been invested ?

exercises.question: is / volatility / high / market / today / the
exercises.answer: the market volatility is high today

exercises.question: not / they / since / have / dividends / paid / June
exercises.answer: they have not paid dividends since June

exercises.question: is / collection / a / portfolio / a / of / assets
exercises.answer: a portfolio is a collection of assets

exercises.question: he / known / has / for / years / him / three
exercises.answer: he has known him for three years

exercises.question: yield / is / the / on / stocks / high / these
exercises.answer: the yield on these stocks is high

exercises.question: we / stocks / have / since / sold / not / any / Monday
exercises.answer: we have not sold any stocks since Monday

exercises.question: bought / she / has / since / ETFs / more / Friday
exercises.answer: she has bought more ETFs since Friday
